name: Wrong Aisle (ChumpForce)
description:
Not your average supermarket at 3AM (IT GOES HORRIBLY WRONG) as you have to collect food for your family. Something is watching.... (not clickbait).

Created as part of the Confetti Game Jam Dec 2022 

Theme: Co-Op

Wrong Aisle lets you control a shopping trolley being pushed by two demon babies inside an alternative Co-op, the purpose of the game is to collect enough items to feed your family, while avoiding an unsettling presence that is lurking around the aisles stalking its prey.

This game is designed to be played locally by two people, with one player controlling the cart as you speed around, and the second player needs to control the magic hand to grab the items on the shelves and place it in the basket.

Programming - Jared Blackman

Asset Creation - Kade Griffin, Ross Tinley-Thorpe

Environment Artist - Will Monk

Character Artist - Dara Cavanagh

Music - Joe Hollis

Other Sounds : FreeSound.org
